mapper.select: SELECT PRJ.NO FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN (SELECT * FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS WHERE NO IN (SELECT MAX(NO) AS NO FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS GROUP BY REF_PRJ_NO) ) TPP ON TPP.REF_PRJ_NO = PRJ.NO WHERE TPP.STATUS = 'TEMPORARY' AND PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = '${userNo}'

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_CONTENT, PRJ.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_REGEIST_DATE, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, PRJ.CURRENT_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_CURRENT_AMOUNT FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ WHERE PRJ.NO = ${projectNo}
AND PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_CONTENT, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, PRJ.CURRENT_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_CURRENT_AMOUNT, PRJ.VIEWS AS TBL_PRJ_VIEWS, TP.NAME AS TBL_PRODUCT_NAME, TP.PRICE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.MAX_QUANTITY AS TBL_PRODUCT_MAX_QUANTITY, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE AS TBL_PRODUCT_PRODUCT_SIZE, TC.NAME AS TBL_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ LEFT JOIN TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST TPPL ON PRJ.NO = TPPL.REF_PRJ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TP.NO = TPPL.REF_PRODUCT_NO JOIN TBL_CATEGORY TC ON TC.NO = PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PRJ.NO = #{projectNo} AND PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT PRJ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_NO , PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, PRJ.START_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_START_DATE, PRJ.END_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_END_DATE, PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_TARGET_AMOUNT, PRJ.CURRENT_AMOUNT AS TBL_PRJ_CURRENT_AMOUNT, TPP2.STATUS AS TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS_STATUS, TPP2.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS_CONTENT FROM TBL_PRJ PRJ JOIN (SELECT * FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS WHERE NO IN (SELECT MAX(NO) AS REF_PRJ_NO FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS GROUP BY REF_PRJ_NO) ) TPP2 ON TPP2.REF_PRJ_NO = PRJ.NO WHERE PRJ.NO = #{projectNo} AND PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRJ_NO.currval FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRJ PRJ SET PRJ.TITLE ='${title}', PRJ.START_DATE = '${startDate}', PRJ.END_DATE = '${endDate}', PRJ.TARGET_AMOUNT = ${targetAmount}, PRJ.REF_CATEGORY_NO = ${category.no} WHERE PRJ.NO = ${no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_WISH TPW (TPW.REF_MEMBER_NO, TPW.REF_PRJ_NO) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{projectNo})
mapper.select: SELECT TPRO.NAME, TSP.AMOUNT FROM TBL_DELIVERY_STATUS TDS JOIN TBL_SHIPPING_TRACK_INFO TSTI on TDS.REF_SHIPPING_TRACK_INFO_NO = TSTI.NO JOIN TBL_PAYMENT TP ON TP.CODE = TSTI.REF_PAYMENT_NO JOIN TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY TPH ON TPH.REF_PAYMENT_NO = TP.CODE JOIN TBL_SPONSORED_PRJ TSP ON TSP.NO = TPH.REF_SPONSORED_PRJ_NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST TPPL ON TPPL.NO = TSP.REF_PRJ_PRODUCT_LIST_NO JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TPRO ON TPRO.NO = TPPL.REF_PRODUCT_NO WHERE TPPL.REF_PRJ_NO = #{projectNo}
